tables.name: neutron_ics_consumer_validators
tables.description: This table provides information on ICS (Inter-Blockchain Communication) consumer validators within the Cosmos ecosystem, where validators are nodes that consume data from another blockchain. It includes details about the provider addresses, consumer keys, and commission rates, among other relevant information.

columns.name: provider_address
columns.description: Validator public key used as an address for transactions

columns.name: consumer_key_ed25519
columns.description: Public key generated by a consumer for ICS

columns.name: power
columns.description: Validator's minimum power threshold

columns.name: rate
columns.description: Validation and consensus rate of validators

columns.name: consumer_power
columns.description: Merged validator's effective power contribution

columns.name: consumer_commission_rate
columns.description: Percentage of reward commission taken by the consumer

columns.name: provider_commission_rate
columns.description: Percentage of incentive reward commission taken by the provider

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Human-readable name of the validator

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's identity tag

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's official website

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Validator's point of contact for security concerns

columns.name: details
columns.description: Extra information about the validator

columns.name: provider_operator_address
columns.description: Operator's public key used in provider context

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Validator's jailed status for misbehaviour

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the validator (e.g., unjailed, jailed, unbonding)

columns.name: provider_tokens
columns.description: Validator's incentive token balance

columns.name: provider_power
columns.description: Validator's power within the provider context

columns.name: validates_current_epoch
columns.description: Validator's status in the current epoch

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block at which the data was last updated

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block at which the data was last updated

columns.name: address
columns.description: Validator's or delegator's public address on the blockchain

tables.name: neutron_slinky_prices
tables.description: Cosmos blockchain data related to cryptocurrency trading pairs. This table includes historical prices for various trading pairs within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Identifier for a specific block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Unix timestamp when the corresponding block was mined.

columns.name: ticker
columns.description: Symbol representing the cryptocurrency being traded on the market.

columns.name: pair_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific trading pair in IBC ecosystem.

columns.name: price
columns.description: Current market price of a cryptocurrency in the trading pair.

columns.name: decimals
columns.description: Number of decimal places the cryptocurrency price represents.

columns.name: nonce
columns.description: Sequential count to ensure the uniqueness of transactions or messages.

tables.name: neutron_slinky_prices_deltas
tables.description: This table provides a record of changes in validator vote prices from Cosmos Ecosystem blockchains, capturing the deltas in vote power and price.

columns.name: validator_address
columns.description: Identifier for a staking validator on the blockchain network

columns.name: validator_power
columns.description: Staking power represented by a validator across the network

columns.name: block_id_flag
columns.description: Bit flag indicating block inclusion in a Merkle tree

columns.name: extension_signature
columns.description: Cryptographic signature of block extension data

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential identifier for a block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block is included in the blockchain

columns.name: vote_prices
columns.description: Prices of specific assets in relation to voting power

columns.name: ingested_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data is ingested into the analytics system

tables.name: neutron_validators
tables.description: Active Cosmos validators, a crucial component of the Cosmos Network, store and validate blocks ensuring the integrity and security of the chain. Their details are vital for users to choose a validator that suits their needs.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Address of validator's operator

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Ethereum-style address associated with the validator operation

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public key used for consensus in validator's native chain

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Status indicating whether the validator is jailed

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current operational status of the validator

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Total tokens delegated to the validator

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Human-readable name of the validator

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's identity details

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's official website

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Validator's contact for security-related matters

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details about the validator

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Height at which the validator will begin unbonding

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Timestamp at which the validator will begin unbonding

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Percentage of rewards allocated as commission

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Maximum commission rate allowed

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Maximum commission rate adjustment allowed

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Timestamp for commission rate updates

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum delegation amount for the validator

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Height of the latest snapshot for the validator

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Timestamp of the latest snapshot for the validator

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database
